body.name: The Loyal Subjects Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles April O'Neil BST AXN 5-inch Action Figure with Accessories

byLineInfo.name: Visit the The Loyal Subjects Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 32 mins
features: Cowabunga! Check out this 1:15 scale, BST AXN 5-inch Action Figure from the iconic franchise Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.
This 1987 version of April is sporting her classic yellow jumpsuit with her signature auburn hair and rocking a white belt, 80’s style white boots and matching watch.
With 31 points of articulation, bend this Ninja Turtle into the perfect pose for display or take them on crime-fighting adventures of your own imagining.

Figure comes with a microphone, headset and camcorder to help her document her adventures and since the turtles get her into all sorts of shenanigans she's also armed and dangerous with her trusty handgun.
Figure includes an additional interchangeable head portrait, and three interchangeable sets of hands.
body.description: From The Loyal Subects Wave 2. These 5" collectible figurines feature 31 points of articulation, plus removable/interchangeable hands, and accessories! Packaged in a clear window box.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All the feels, and then some! Pulling your hair out on the simplicity and lack of detail in the 3” and 4” action figure variety? Can’t seem to find the space for all those bulky, expensive 6” action figures? Want something uniform, as if all the figures are fighting for universal supremacy in a scale that feels good? Do you love anime, nostalgia, and music, but feel your interests have been under-represented at retail? We have the perfect solution for you: BST AXN! A 5”, highly detailed, highly articulated action figure! Finally: scale, detail, articulation, character range, and all the accessories to meet your action figure collecting needs!

Want the BST FEATURES? Each figure comes with an additional head portrait, multiple accessories, and the best sculpt and paint in the business! Customize, play, and display to your heart’s content! Need the BST ARTICULATION? Each figure features 31 points of articulation, swivel bicep and thigh joints, double knee, shoulder, and elbow joints, as well as ball joints for maximum poseability! Gotta have the BST ASSORTMENT? We have all your favorites from all of pop culture, including TMNT, music, movies, and anime!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the alternate head included.
reviews.reviewText: This is my first figure from the BST AXN line. April has nice joint tolerances, no loose joints, the plastic feels good, although the elbows are dainty and very fragile looking, and not painted well either, move them with caution. She has a nice assortment of accessories, and as my headline states, I love the alternate scared/suprised head. The headset doesn't fit on her head, though I've seen some people force it and it looks kind of silly. The other accessories are nice. I like the packaging style in this series with nice window boxes, and April's box art looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice looking. The arms are a little fragile, but in general she looks great. Much better than the Neca one. She just needed a smiling face to be perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casey Jones kicks butt
reviews.reviewText: So this is a figure of Casey Jones from the BodyCount and Image series. Well made, very poseable, cool accessories (would have liked more). I dig it and have no regrets buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and fragile
reviews.reviewText: Bottom line, the head sculpt is good. Body is a little smaller than I would’ve liked. Arms seem very fragile and can break easy so be careful. Overall it’s ok..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not horrible at all, but several joints being too loose lowered the score :(
reviews.reviewText: Hi! This review is of April O’Neil :)I shot some silly pictures to show some of her articulation and most were taken before the below fixes; no tape, etc. was used. After the fixes, she was able to hold poses better. The picture with her arms in the air is with her fixed bent knee (tightened with liquid floor polish), which supported her weight without collapsiing. (I don't know how to load pictures in a certain sequence... sorry) Hope the pictures help :)Her head swiveled 360 degrees and mine had almost no ability to look up, down nor side to side.Her Left Butterfly Joint, Diaphragm Joint, Hip Sockets (Left was much worse), Knees (both, but Left was very loose) and both ankles were very loose.I had a little bit of experience with a different BST AXN figure (Aang), so I checked April’s joints and her thigh-cut swivels were pretty tight, but not nearly as stuck as Aang’s. However, her Left Hip joint popped off quickly. At first, this was okay because I wanted to remove her legs and put them in hot water for a couple minutes, to free up the thigh-cuts and the hinges on her hands. After I did that, all those joints moved much easier.To address joints the loose Hips and Diaphragm Joints, I took off her legs, put a small Kleenx-type tissue (folded in half) over the ball joint in her hips and then put the legs back in. That tightened the hips up enough, for me. The Diaphragm was "fixed" the same way, as well.I used several drops of floor polish to tighten her knees, elbows and and ankles... that held them “okay”, but I think this will need to be done often. I don’t want to say what brand, as I am not trying to promote any brand of floor polish. But, if you choose that method, best to research to see which might be best for your needs or even a better method.Her waist looked like it could swivel around, but I was not able to get it to move, so figured the waist wasn’t meant to swivel. This is not a complaint, but an observation in case anyone tries to swivel it and might break theirs.- Overall thoughts -One thing I really liked was how posable her legs were, even though they came off easily. The Hip Joints were able to turn 360 degrees and turning the legs 180 degrees via the Thigh Cuts didn’t look horrid to me, but might to some other people.Although the hips popped off very easily and other joints were floppy, I figured I’d rather have that happen than have joints bend or break because they were too tight or stuck. The temporary fixes for the joints were easy to do, but will need to be redone as needed.I almost forgot... I really appreciated that her trigger finger is soft, so was easily positionable to get the finger into the trigger well.Rating...I feel the ranges of motion inspired creative posing that I’d not been able to do with most of my other action figures in this price range. However, the loose joints detracted from the fun factor; doing DIY fixes didn’t bother me. The result is a 3.40 out of 5 stars. Due to the whole star rating system, sadly dropping to 3 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I expected.
reviews.reviewText: Hard item to buy, but thanks to Amazon, I found it for my grandbaby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a neat toy, looks just like slash. Construction seems fairly durable (unlike April who seems a bit fragile). I will say make sure your kids put it away! Face up or face down, the sharp points on his she'll and armor are extremely sharp. It will hurt more than a bucket of Legos if you step on it. Consider age too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought a second one because the first one the arm broke within a month. The new one the arm broke off the next day. Not buying this brand again
Arrive on time and not damaged this is a cool action figure very satisfied
Es una gran figura, cuenta con muchos accesorios , y se parece mucho a la versión de la caricatura,el único detalle de la figura es que es algo pequeña pero fuera de eso es una buena figura.
